overview: Metro City has many protectors. Super heroines with amazing powers and abilities that make the citizens feel safe. When these super heroines start disappearing, Agent Omega of the international spy organization, F.U.R.Y initiates a dream team of heroines to get to the bottom of this mystery.
tagline: When the world needs saving, there will always be Heroines of F.U.R.Y.!
title: Heroines of F.U.R.Y.
